page.title: 15FARMING
page.content: Farm is arable with computerised dairy. milking is done in a modern herringbone system linked to a computer which works out feeding amounts for each cow according to its needs & milk yield. Computer is activated by numbered tag worn by each cow round her neck. Highest yeidl in December, lowest in August. Dairy herd has l80 milking cows. There are 200 calves, 30 heifers & 120 bull beef. Farm owned by Limited Company, 400 acres arable, 200 acres grass, 20 acres what, 20,000 tons of silage is made per annum for feeding cattle from September to April. Wooded area mixed trees includes larch plantation, oak felled at 10 year intervals, hazel coppice at 7 years for hurdles.
